options.content: query sql text to be here

panels.description: based on pg_wait_sampling representation of wait events

targets.expr: sum by (wait_type, wait_event, queryid) (pg_wait_sampling_count{fqdn="$fqdn", queryid="$queryid", wait_type!~""})/1500
sum by (wait_type, wait_event, queryid) (pg_wait_sampling_count{fqdn="$fqdn", queryid="$queryid", wait_type=""})/1500

panels.title: queryid:$queryid wait events
queryid:$queryid CPU total time per call (pg_stat_kcache)
